name: fast-node-switcher
description: Quickly switch between Node.js versions using nvm, volta, or mise

fastNodeSwitcher.misePath.description: Custom path to mise executable (e.g., C:\Users\username\AppData\Local\Microsoft\WinGet\Links\mise.exe). Leave empty for auto-detection.

fastNodeSwitcher.nvmPath.description: Custom path to nvm executable (nvm.exe on Windows, nvm.sh on Unix). Leave empty for auto-detection.

fastNodeSwitcher.voltaPath.description: Custom path to volta executable. Leave empty for auto-detection.

fastNodeSwitcher.preferredTool.description: Preferred version manager. 'auto' will use nvm if available, otherwise volta, otherwise mise.

fastNodeSwitcher.autoApplyNvmrc.description: Automatically detect and apply .nvmrc file or Volta's package.json configuration when opening a workspace.

author: baizhi958216
